languages.text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Подразделение Экклезиархии, ответственное за воспитание, образование и подготовку сирот офицеров и аристократов, погибших на службе Империуму.

traits.locale_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.

languages.text: Подразделение Экклезиархии, ответственное за воспитание, образование и подготовку сирот офицеров и аристократов, погибших на службе Империуму.
Eine Abteilung der Ekklesiarchie, die für die Erziehung, Bildung und Ausbildung der Waisen von Offizieren und Adligen zuständig ist, die im Dienst des Imperiums gestorben sind.
languages.original_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Eine Abteilung der Ekklesiarchie, die für die Erziehung, Bildung und Ausbildung der Waisen von Offizieren und Adligen zuständig ist, die im Dienst des Imperiums gestorben sind.

languages.text: Branche de l'Ecclésiarchie chargée d'éduquer et de former les orphelins des officiers et des nobles ayant donné leur vie au service de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Branche de l'Ecclésiarchie chargée de l'éducation, de l'instruction et de la formation des orphelins des officiers et des nobles morts en servant l'Imperium.

languages.text: 国教教会的分支，这个机构负责抚养、教育、训练那些为帝国捐躯的官员与贵族遗留下来的孤儿。
languages.original_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 国教教会的分支，这个机构负责抚养、教育、训练那些为帝国捐躯的官员与贵族遗留下来的孤儿。

languages.text: 帝国のために戦死した士官や貴族（ノーブル）の遺児の養育、教育、訓練を担当する帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）の一部門。
languages.original_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 帝国のために戦死した士官や貴族（ノーブル）の遺児の養育、教育、訓練を担当する帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）の一部門。

languages.text: División de la Eclesiarquía responsable de la crianza, educación y entrenamiento de los huérfanos de aquellos oficiales y nobles que hayan muerto sirviendo al Imperium.
languages.original_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: División de la Eclesiarquía responsable de la crianza, educación y entrenamiento de los huérfanos de aquellos oficiales y nobles que hayan muerto sirviendo al Imperium.

languages.text: İmparatorluk hizmetinde can veren subay ve soyluların yetim kalan çocuklarının yetiştirilmesi, eğitim ve öğretiminden sorumlu bir Ekleşiarşi bölümü.
languages.original_text: A division of the Ecclesiarchy responsible for the upbringing, education, and training of orphans of those officers and nobles who have died in the service of the Imperium.
